name: The Neverending Dungeon
description:
The Neverending Dungeon is a small arcade with procedurally generated puzzle levels, where your goal is to get the highest score possible.

Controls:

Use arrow keys/WASD on your keyboard or swipes/on-screen controls on touchscreen devices.

Space and ESCto go through menu options.

Credits:

Game by poppants

Get it on your Android device absolutely for FREE with no ads, in-game purchases or other bullcr@p!
